document_data.name: ''Lafarallin's Mail''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lafarallin's Mail''''' was an enchanted suit of [[elven chainmail]] once worn by the great [[elven]] hero [[Lafarallin]].
document_data.Powers: The [[armor]] felt weightless when worn and, in addition to providing magical protection from physical attacks, the armor made it easier to resist [[spell]] effects.
document_data.History: The suit of chainmail was preserved at Queen [[Amlaruil Moonflower]]'s palace on [[Evermeet]].
